snippet: Andy Murray avoided following Novak Djokovic out of the Monte Carlo Masters exit door after surviving a scare against local favorite Benoit Paire to reach the quarter-finals with a 2-6 7-5 7-5 victory on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray avoided following Novak Djokovic out of the Monte Carlo Masters exit door after surviving a scare against local favorite Benoit Paire to reach the quarter-finals with a 2-6 7-5 7-5 victory on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Murray Survives Paire Scare to Reach Monte Carlo Quarters
headline.main: Murray Survives Paire Scare to Reach Monte Carlo Quarters
